item.title: San Francisco resources
item.description: Trauma-informed spiritual groups SF Dharma Collective SF Zen Center GLIDE radically inclusive church (there are many more) Immersion Learning & Retreat Centers 1440 Multiversity - Santa Cruz Esalen Institute — Big Sur holistic alternative retreat center Spirit Rock — Marin Insight meditation center Green Gulch Farm — Marin Deer Park Monastery — Escondido, CA — Thich Nhat Hanh’s monestary in the US HIV/AIDS Support SF AIDS Foundation The Shanti Project

item.title: Trans* & Genderqueer Resources
item.description: Identity Nonbinary Flowchart — what’s my gender? Changing ID Documents US resource guide — how to change your papers, for every state in the US Health Insurance in the US Transcend Legal videos on how to get trans healthcare covered. Hormones Hormones: A Guide for FTMs Hormones: A Guide for MTFs How to get hormones in the US and in the UK Background reading on the world of hormones Healthcare of the Transgender Patient and the Powers Method of Hormonal Transitioning lecture notes by Dr.
